attributes.action: Start a British Man based mission to the Moon, Then onto Mars
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The benefits from technological advances, to finding and sourceing resources are immense. The cost of any British Space Programme would be paid back 100 fold. Imagine the benefits to the younger generation of children growing up with a British Space program, being a part of it, Just look at what nasa has acheived. The Time is now to grasp this golden opportunity for the UK to start its own independant space program.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
